title: Air chief thanks NA Speaker, MNAs for lauding PAF response to Indian aggression
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 3 (APP): Chief of the Air Staff Air Chief Marshal Zaheer Ahmed Baber Sidhu on Thursday expressed profound gratitude to the Speaker of National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq, and all members of the House for their letter of felicitation on the PAF’s resolute and befitting response to the Indian aggression.
In a letter addressed to NA Speaker, the Air Chief Marshal, on behalf of all ranks of the Pakistan Air Force, extended sincere appreciation for the unwavering support, solidarity, and prayers expressed by the national leadership and members of Parliament in their speeches on the floor of the House.
The Air Chief emphasized that the PAF’s operational success was a manifestation of a unified national approach, underpinned by the blessings of Allah Almighty.
He lauded the Pakistani nation for demonstrating exceptional unity and standing firmly with the armed forces to counter the adversary’s hostile designs. The collective resolve of the nation reflects its preparedness to confront all challenges with unwavering courage and determination, he added.
Air Chief Marshal Zaheer Ahmed Baber Sidhu also acknowledged Allah’s benevolence in enabling the PAF to safeguard the aerial frontiers of the motherland in line with the nation’s expectations.
He further reaffirmed the Pakistan Air Force’s unwavering commitment to extending full support toward fulfilling any national imperative in defence of the country’s sovereignty and territorial integrity.
He also expressed resolve that Pakistan Air Force remained ever-vigilant and fully prepared to respond to any threat, upholding its sacred duty to protect the skies of Pakistan.
